attributes.action: Free Internet on tfl buses and trains.
attributes.additional_details: It would be extremely beneficial for all tfl service users to be able to stay connected whilst they are traveling, as workers and students would now be able to do work on the go and not waste time being unproductive.
attributes.background: Install free Internet routers in buses.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about access to data services on Transport for London services are a matter for TfL, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
